mapper.insert: insert into qa_buglist (BUG_ID, BUG_PROJECT_ID, BUG_CR_TYPE_ID, BUG_CR_NUM, BUG_TASK_NUM, QA_TYPE_ID, BUG_DESCRIPTION, BUG_RCA, BUG_SOLUTION, QA_ASSIGNEE_ID, QA_TESTER_ID, QA_CREATIONDT, QA_UPDATEDT, BUG_DELETED_FLAG, BUG_DELETED_COMMENT ) values (#{bugId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bugProjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bugCrTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bugCrNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bugTaskNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qaTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bugDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bugRca,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bugSolution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qaAssigneeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qaTesterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qaCreationdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{qaUpdatedt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{bugDeletedFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, #{bugDeletedComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update qa_buglist set BUG_PROJECT_ID = #{bugProjectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUG_CR_TYPE_ID = #{bugCrTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUG_CR_NUM = #{bugCrNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUG_TASK_NUM = #{bugTaskNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QA_TYPE_ID = #{qaTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, BUG_DESCRIPTION = #{bugDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUG_RCA = #{bugRca,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUG_SOLUTION = #{bugSolution,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QA_ASSIGNEE_ID = #{qaAssigneeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, QA_TESTER_ID = #{qaTesterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, QA_CREATIONDT = #{qaCreationdt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, QA_UPDATEDT = #{qaUpdatedt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BUG_DELETED_FLAG = #{bugDeletedFlag,jdbcType=BIT}, BUG_DELETED_COMMENT = #{bugDeletedComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BUG_ID = #{bugId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select BUG_ID, BUG_PROJECT_ID, BUG_CR_TYPE_ID, BUG_CR_NUM, BUG_TASK_NUM, QA_TYPE_ID, BUG_DESCRIPTION, BUG_RCA, BUG_SOLUTION, QA_ASSIGNEE_ID, QA_TESTER_ID, QA_CREATIONDT, QA_UPDATEDT, BUG_DELETED_FLAG, BUG_DELETED_COMMENT from qa_buglist where BUG_ID = #{bugId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select BUG_ID, BUG_PROJECT_ID, BUG_CR_TYPE_ID, BUG_CR_NUM, BUG_TASK_NUM, QA_TYPE_ID, BUG_DESCRIPTION, BUG_RCA, BUG_SOLUTION, QA_ASSIGNEE_ID, QA_TESTER_ID, QA_CREATIONDT, QA_UPDATEDT, BUG_DELETED_FLAG, BUG_DELETED_COMMENT from qa_buglist
